      • Dictionary

        public Dictionary(java.lang.String filePath)
        constructor with a file path as an input. the file contents words, and the content of the file will become the content of a dictionary.

      • invariant

        public boolean invariant()
        check invariant for a dictionary. A dictionary is NOT invariant when:
      • length of a word is smaller then 2.
      • length of a word is bigger than 100.
      • number of words in a dictionary is smaller than 3.
      • number of words in a dictionary is bigger than 1000.
      • there is at least a word whose length is different from other's.
      • there is at least an invalid character of a word
Specified by:
invariant in interface HasInvariant
